definition: wide expanse/large area/vast stretch/extending widely/blockbuster movie
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
(Tw) cosmetic contact lens/big eye contact lens/circle contact lens

sentences.english: The seedlings were placed in a big flat.
sentences.chinese: 秧苗被放置在一大片浅苗床上。

sentences.english: On high the great white clouds slid swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 大片大片的白云在高空飘过。

sentences.english: On high the great white clouds slid swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 大片大片的白云在高空飘过。

sentences.english: There is wind everyday in this summer, and there are masses of clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 这个夏天每天都有风，并且有大片的云彩飘来飘去。

sentences.english: There are vast fields of sugarcane in Queensland, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亚昆士兰州有大片甘蔗田。

sentences.english: One passive method of control is to plant the tree in a large aviary wire basket.
sentences.chinese: 其中被动控制方法，是植物树在一大片观鸟丝篮。

sentences.english: The Serengeti is a huge area of grassland in Tanzania, Africa.
sentences.chinese: 塞伦盖蒂国家公园是位于坦尚尼亚境内的一大片草原。

sentences.english: Use the tools that hollywood uses to create blockbuster films and special effects.
sentences.chinese: 好莱坞曾经用这款工具制作过电影大片和特殊效果。

sentences.english: The winds of the Great Plains caused huge dust storms on overgrazed lands.
sentences.chinese: 大平原上的大片草原由于过分放牧而逐渐荒芜。

sentences.english: Use the Ice Drill to bypass a large section of the GARM facility.
sentences.chinese: 利用冰钻绕过GARM设施的一大片区域。

sentences.english: Lin made her movie debut in the first part of this historical epic.
sentences.chinese: 林志玲是在这部历史大片的第一部分首次“触电”。

sentences.english: A broad open space was cleared in the middle of the garret.
sentences.chinese: 破屋子的中间顿时空了一大片。

sentences.english: People have been anxiously awaiting another martial arts blockbuster from Zhang Yimou.
sentences.chinese: 人们一直在急切地等待着张艺谋的下一部武打大片。

sentences.english: Then suddenly they vanished behind a great clump of trees growing in the middle of the Hippodrome .
sentences.chinese: 然后他们突然被跑马场中间的一大片树丛遮挡住了。

sentences.english: We crossed wide stretches of moorland without relief.
sentences.chinese: 我们走过大片景色单调的荒野。

definition: (of a large number of things) to form an expanse/to cover an area

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
to sell at auction/to reach a given price at auction
Curse of the Golden Flower (2007), period drama movie by Zhang Yimou
pinyin: Man3 cheng2 jin4 dai4 huang2 jin1 jia3
